title: pAhi mAm anisham
sahitya:
pAhi mAm anisham shrI padmanAbha murArE pari


anupallavi

  dEhi mE tava sEvAm mOhana guNa nilaya


caraNam 1   pada natajana bhava khEda daLana nipuNa mrdutara suhAsa mudita muni mAnasa
    caraNam 2    sarasa ghana sadrsha sundara tanu suSama shArada vidhu mukha viracaya mE kushalam
    caraNam 3    kAma janaka rucira kamala daLa nayana kamanIya tama kIrtE mama hrdi parilasa
